title: KomoraLink Frontend - Standardized PRD
summary: Minimal PRD generated for TestSprite runs. Contains main user flows: onboarding, authentication, product browsing, cart & checkout, inventory and orders.

primary_flows.name: User onboarding and authentication
primary_flows.description: User can register, login, reset password via OTP flows.

primary_flows.name: Product discovery and cart
primary_flows.description: Users can browse products, view details, add to cart and view shopping cart.

primary_flows.name: Inventory management
primary_flows.description: Business users can view inventory, receive stock, and view expiring products.

primary_flows.name: Orders and transactions
primary_flows.description: Users can view orders and transactions, and manage orders.

notes: This is a minimal PRD to satisfy TestSprite MCP CLI requirements for test generation.
